price: E Ele é Quem envia o vento, como alvissareiro, adiante de Sua misericórdia. E do céu fazemos descer água pura.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَرۡسَلَ ٱلرِّيَٰحَ بُشۡرَۢا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡ رَحۡمَتِهِۦۚ وَأَنزَلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ طَهُورٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa alladhī arsala al-riyāḥa bush'ran bayna yaday raḥmatihi wa-anzalnā mina al-samāi māan ṭahūran
